title: Every Evan Peters Character on American Horror Story
author: TV Guide
comment: I think this guy is best actor when it comes to playing psychopath.
Kit Walker is so underrated, he's not problematic af like Tate
He's like a shape shifter. He can play any role from any time era so perfectly.  Don't see why he doesnt have an emmy yet.
Evan Peters. Sexually confusing women since 2011.
As Tate he's really attractive. Tate is charming and horrifying in many ways
description:
From Murder House to Cult, see Evan Peters' American Horror Story evolution.
